ml_tags: Sunrise 15th March 1987 Sunset 2nd October 2021 He was a great man who loved his family dearly Who lived life with Mana, Pride  & Passion & enriched the lives of all who knew him Our hearts have been left broken Since that horrible day We will never be complete Until we are with you again ANTHONY TAKROUNA BELL & respected him Cherished by so many who loved In Loving Memory of BELL before his time You will always be missed Tragically taken from us long
